content: अवे {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> [अव इ] {@--1@} ({%a%}) To know, understand, learn, perceive, be aware of; अवैमि ते तस्यां सोदर्यस्नेहं <ls>Ś. 4</ls>; अवैमि चैनामनघेति <ls>R. 14. 40</ls>; द्विषदभियोग इत्यवैति <ls>Mu. 1. 7.</ls>; अवैमि ते सारं <ls>Ku. 3. 13</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 35.</ls> ({%b%}) To know, look upon or consider, regard, तदवैमि कैतवं <ls>Ku. 4. 9</ls>; <ls>Ś. 5. 11</ls>; <ls>Bk. 7. 33</ls>; किं मां सुतक्षयकरं सुत इत्यवैषि <ls>Ve. 5. 2.</ls> {@--2@} To go or move away. {@--3@} To go to, approach (with <ab>acc.</ab>). {@--4@} To rush upon, come down upon (<ab>Ved.</ab>) {%--<ab>Freq.</ab>%} or {%<ab>Pass.</ab>%} (अवेयते) To beg pardon for, conciliate.
